mapper.select: select count(*) from eats_user where user_idx != 1

select * from ( select rownum as rnum, a.* from ( select user_idx, user_id, user_pwd, user_name, user_email, TO_CHAR(user_birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS user_birth, user_gender, join_method from eats_user where user_idx != 1
order by user_idx desc ) a ) b where rnum >= (#{cp} - 1) * #{listSize} + 1 and rnum <= #{cp} * #{listSize}

select us.user_idx, us.user_id, us.user_pwd, us.user_name, us.user_email, TO_CHAR(user_birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS user_birth, us.user_gender, us.join_method, up.user_nickname, up.user_intro, up.user_tel, up.user_point from eats_user us left join user_profile up on us.user_idx = up.user_idx WHERE us.user_idx = #{user_idx}
